ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 229
ygData.msgSnippet: Speaking of which-what level range are the Giant Skeletons in Rathe Mountains anyhow? Would I be able to take them at 23? And they spawn right in the
ygData.messageBody:
Speaking of which-what level range are the Giant Skeletons in Rathe Mountains
anyhow? Would I be able to take them at 23? And they spawn right in the
cyclops-infested hill area with other undead right?

Thanks in advance!
Aazen Sy'Vex

In a message dated 1/25/00 4:03:39 AM Pacific Standard Time,
EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com writes:

<<
Message: 1
Date: Mon, 24 Jan 2000 09:15:10 -0500
From: "Fraal" <mata_eq@...>
Subject: Re: where @ 23rd

one problem, at 23rd . .. . no SoP yet. . . :-(

----- Original Message -----
From: Tony B
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, January 22, 2000 2:28 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] where @ 23rd


From: "Tony B" <tonyb72@...>

actually, i use exclusively SoP. i do this- send pet to attack (while
waiting at edge of casting range). once it starts attacking, cast
darkness,
then SoP.
if darkness didnt stick, try again til it does. if the third one doesnt
work, generally you are S.O.L., so just feign til pet dies, and try again
in
a bit.
anyway, once darkness sticks, just blast away with SoP, and when it gets
mad
at you just run til your pet taunts it off, and piss it off some more with
another casting. so just run, cast, run, cast, til dead.

belphenor

>A lot of Expulse undead, life tap as needed. Pretty tough at 23 at least
>for me. I learned at 24 DO NOT use SOP that really pisses them off, use
it
>just to finish them off :)
